channel.title: Client.java:12839: illegal start of expression

item.title: Client.java:12839: illegal start of expression
item.dc:creator: @rsc rsc
item.description:
@rsc wrote:

changed to what you said and :

[code]client.java:12496: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable additem
location: class client
if (additem == 0) {
^
client.java:12499: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable additem
location: class client
additem = 1;
^
client.java:12500: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable additem
location: class client
} else if (additem == 1) {
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors

RSC Has Been Compiled SuccesFully!

Press any key to continue . . .[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2007, 09:08:55 AM[/size][hr]do i need to declare the variable?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2007, 09:10:58 AM[/size][hr]SORRY for triple posting but:

i have fixed this now thank you for your help people i just had to add an } and declare the variable.

thanks
rsc

item.title: Client.java:12839: illegal start of expression
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

change this

if (command.startsWith("agility")) {
teleportToX = 2998;
teleportToY = 3932;
sendMessage("Welcome To Agility");
sendMessage("MADE BY RSC");
if (additem == 0) {addItem(6657, 1);
sendMessage("RSC Camo/Agility Top.!");
additem = 1;
} else if (additem == 1) {
sendMessage("You have already received your Camo/Agility Top.");
}

To this

if (command.startsWith("agility")) {
	teleportToX = 2998;
	teleportToY = 3932;
	sendMessage("Welcome To Agility");
	sendMessage("MADE BY RSC");
	if (additem == 0) {
	addItem(6657, 1);
	sendMessage("RSC Camo/Agility Top.!");
	additem = 1;
	} else if (additem == 1) {
	sendMessage("You have already received your Camo/Agility Top.");
	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java:12839: illegal start of expression
item.dc:creator: @rsc rsc
item.description:
@rsc wrote:

Hi i am experiencing a recurring problem.

When i tried to make my server silabs comptible this error came up:

[code]client.java:12839: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^
1 error

RSC Has Been Compiled SuccesFully!

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

a few seconds ago i added a new command.

if (command.startsWith("agility")) { teleportToX = 2998; teleportToY = 3932; sendMessage("Welcome To Agility"); sendMessage("MADE BY RSC"); if (additem == 0) {addItem(6657, 1); sendMessage("RSC Camo/Agility Top.!"); additem = 1; } else if (additem == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your Camo/Agility Top."); }

Now when i try to compile i get this error:

[code]client.java:12839: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^
1 error

RSC Has Been Compiled SuccesFully!

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

and nothing seems to update/compile because the agility command doesn’t work at all and i updated the quest menu and that hasn’t updates either.

any help appreciated.

thanks very much

rsc

Read full topic
